entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 33.
